CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1945, pg. 13 reads: "Prayer For Victory - On the V-E Day celebrated last Tuesday, ...Mrs. Oliver I. Johnson of Wilkinsburg (right) reads: her son's Bible on V-E Day, and will be reading it again Sunday in remembrance of her son T/5 [?] Oliver M. Johnson, who was killed in Luxembourg. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Gold Star mother Mrs. Oliver I. Johnson seated on sofa with open bible in hand, in domestic interior
